name: Gravitational Shift
description:
You were minding your own business until a blackhole appeared out of nowhere and engulfed you in its power. 

Gravity within the blackhole behaves very differently and it has become very unstable. Use it to your advantage to escape and get back home. Good Luck!

W/A/S/D or Arrow keys to move. Left Mouse Button to shoot when it's accessed.

Gravitational Shift was created over the course of 3 days for the Minimalist Game Jam and Ludum Dare 49.

 The limitation was only using geometric for assets  for the Minimalist Game Jam which I liked very much as I'm not the greatest artist. The theme for Ludum Dare was 'Unstable'  and I thought of Gravity being unstable.

All art, code, and music created by me - OneSmallBoy

Sounds effects were unfortunately not made by me.

P.S If you are stuck on Level 7, try shooting the Gravity Box
